name: Cagney 2020
description:
What goes on in the mind of an alien stranded trying to restart its ship as well as its lust for life? 

You find yourself stranded on an unknown planet with no recollection of what happened. Upon returning to your ship orbiting Earth you find you need to do a complete system restart! if you only you made that a straightforward task...

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backward

D - Right

E - Interact

F - Flashlight

Your task is to go through each room and find out how to unlock the next one by fiddling around with everything. Some rooms will be simply flushing the loo, others will be beating 'RainHugs'. 

PlayThrough:
